alert.note: Alert for Cerro Gordo; Hancock; Winnebago; Worth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 7:32PM CDT until April 12 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Worth County in north central Iowa... Eastern Hancock County in north central Iowa... Cerro Gordo County in north central Iowa... Southeastern Winnebago County in north central Iowa... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 731 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles south of Britt, or 15 miles northwest of Clarion, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Garner, Clear Lake and Mason City Municipal Airport. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 180 and 202. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Iowa.
